columns.Body_Builder_ID: The unique identifier for each body builder.
columns.People_ID: The identifier linking to a specific person.
columns.Snatch: The maximum weight lifted in the snatch event.
columns.Clean_Jerk: The maximum weight lifted in the clean and jerk event.
columns.Total: The combined maximum weight lifted in both events.

body_builder.table_description: The table tracks the performance metrics of body builders.

columns.People_ID: The unique identifier for each person.
columns.Name: The full name of the person.
columns.Height: The height of the person in centimeters.
columns.Weight: The weight of the person in kilograms.
columns.Birth_Date: The date when the person was born.
columns.Birth_Place: The location where the person was born.

people.table_description: The table stores personal information about individuals.
